content: - 14 -   Of course, our views about appropriate monetary policy in the months and years   ahead will be informed by incoming economic data and the evolving outlook.  If the   outlook changes, so too will monetary policy.  Our overarching objective will remain the   same: fostering a strong economy for all Americans--one that provides plentiful jobs and   low and stable inflation.
